title: Royal Bondage
description: A lady's every rapturous wish is the king's commandin three regal stories where sex rules the land.SAMANTHA WINSTONLlewellyn's SongAfter Llewellyn, an elf on a mission from the king, rescues a member of an all-female tribe from a dangerous beast, she opens her heart -- and her voluptuous body -- to his forbidden passion...and a tantalizing surprise.DELILAH DEVLINArctic DragonFleeing the mannerly courtship of the tiresome Prince of the Frost Faeries, Queen Larikke of Northland finds ecstasy in the embrace of a sexy barbarian with a seductive secret who shelters her from a winter storm.MARIANNE LACROI XScorpion KingWhen the underwater city of Pacifica is in danger of crumbling, beautiful Queen Naiya Pisces meets a virile naval scientist whose special tattoo fulfills an ancient legend of her people and arouses her most erotic desires.
author: Samantha Winston
